<li>at least 1 month for regular earners</li>
<li>at least 3 months for irregular earners*</li>
</ul>
However, HSBC reserves the right to request for such proof at any time.</li>
<li><strong>Proof of income for non-HSBC auto payroll customers:</strong>
<br>Non-HSBC payroll customers must provide a payroll record of:<ul>
<li>at least 1 month for regular earners</li>
<li>at least 3 months for irregular earners*</li>
</ul>
Acceptable proof of income includes your bank statements or passbook records explicitly showing monthly salary or deposit credits, latest tax demand note, latest payroll advice, or employment letter.<br>
Other acceptable types of documents include bank statements or passbook records showing regular monthly rental income credited to your bank account and a signed tenancy agreement.</li>
<li><strong>Additional supporting documents</strong>
<br>You may be asked to provide either your:<ul>
<li>Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID)  not required for existing HSBC customers</li>
<li>working visa / employment contract / employment letter with employment period details  required for applicants who do not hold a permanent HKID</li>
</ul>
</li></ol>
<p><sub>* Note: Irregular earners include applicants working on a part-time, commission or profit-sharing basis.</sub></p>
